title: How to Master XShorts: Short and Hot Videos in Just 5 Minutes
review_html:
Introduction: What You Will Achieve

This guide will help you quickly master XShorts, the trending short video platform, by teaching you how to create, edit, and share engaging videos in just 5 minutes. Whether you're a beginner or looking to refine your skills, this guide will ensure you’re ready to join the XShorts community.

Prerequisites & Setup

Before starting, ensure you have the following:

  • Download the XShorts App: Available on iOS and Android.
  • Create an Account: Sign up using your email, phone number, or social media account.
  • Enable Permissions: Allow access to your camera, microphone, and storage for seamless video creation.

Core Step-by-Step Guide

Step 1: Opening the App and Navigating the Interface

Tap on the XShorts app icon to launch it. Once opened, familiarize yourself with the home screen, which displays trending videos.

Step 2: Recording Your First Video

Tap the + button at the bottom center of the screen. Hold the record button to start filming, or tap it multiple times for quick clips.

Step 3: Adding Filters and Effects

Swipe left or right on the preview screen to apply filters. Tap the Effects icon to add stickers, text, or transitions.

Step 4: Editing Your Video

Tap the Edit button to trim clips, adjust speed, or add background music. Use the timeline at the bottom to fine-tune your video.

Step 5: Sharing Your Video

Tap Next to add a caption, hashtags, and select your audience. Finally, tap Post to share your video on XShorts.

Common Mistakes to Avoid

  • Ignoring Hashtags: Without relevant hashtags, your video may not reach the right audience.
  • Overloading Effects: Too many effects can make your video look cluttered. Keep it simple and engaging.
  • Skipping Editing: Always trim and polish your video to ensure it looks professional.

Final Checklist & Key Takeaways

  • Download and install the XShorts app.
  • Record your video using the + button.
  • Add filters, effects, and music to enhance your video.
  • Edit your video for a polished look.
  • Share your video with a catchy caption and relevant hashtags.

By following these steps, you’ll be creating and sharing XShorts videos like a pro in no time!

FAQ

Q: How do I save a draft of my video?

A: Tap the Save Draft button before posting. You can access it later in your profile under Drafts.

Q: Can I change the video’s aspect ratio?

A: Yes, tap Edit > Aspect Ratio to choose between square, portrait, or landscape.

Q: How do I delete a video I’ve posted?

A: Go to your profile, tap the video, and select the three dots in the top-right corner. Choose Delete from the menu.
